name: Kowloon's Curse: Lost Report
description:
Welcome to Kowloon City.





You work for the Inspector, the biggest crime boss in the city.

Through the payphone outside your apartment, a man calls to give you your next assignment: retrieve a briefcase that belongs to the Inspector from a nightclub called Echoes. Go and meet Sergio in the Rooster district and carry out the job.

Don't keep the Inspector waiting.




  • A standalone prequel story set several months before the start of Kowloon's Curse.

  • Follow the main story or spend time on side activities: three districts of Kowloon City can be freely explored, each filled with characters, activities and events that change as the story progresses.

  • Fight enemies in turn-based combat, or talk them into becoming your ally. Different outcomes for every encounter.

  • Visual style inspired by Japanese adventure games from the late 1990s and early 2000s.

  • Replayability: different choices and paths will present themselves based on your character's stats and personality, and there are several different ways for the story to play out.
